title: Capstone help!!
content: Iâ€™m a CSE student and I have a problem statement in mind with a novelty but it sounds too simple and it is not something that has general everyday use. It is too specific. Will this be a problem in the panel review?

comments.body: If your guide only cannot approve of the idea, then it won't even be finalised to go to the panel review stage. Either convince your mentor about the problem you are trying to solve or find another one.
